text: The Eruption of Mount St. Helens! is a 1980 American short documentary film directed by George Casey. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. It was released on DVD by Graphic Films Corporation. ==See also== * 1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 films Category:1980 documentary films Category:1980 short films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:English- language films Category:IMAX short films Category:Films shot in Washington (state) Category:Mount St. Helens Category:IMAX documentary films Category:Documentary films about volcanoes
title: The Eruption of Mount St. Helens!
